arts.ttl: Tottenham star was forced to apologise after 'ridiculous' decision against Chelsea
arts.sum: Yves Bissouma was the catalyst for Tottenham's collapse against Chelsea last season as the Blues went from 2-0 down to 4-3 up in a showdown for the ages

arts.ttl: Tottenham v Chelsea live: Premier League team news and build-up to London derby
arts.sum: Spurs host the Blues in a London derby with Thomas Frank’s side eager to keep pace at the top of the Premier League, while Enzo Maresca’s side aim to rebound after defeat to Sunderland

arts.ttl: Thomas Frank era can ignite with rare Tottenham win over Chelsea
arts.sum: The Tottenham boss has the chance to get every supporters onside with a win over Chelsea.

arts.ttl: Garnacho & Gittens hailed by Maresca as Chelsea duo push for starts vs Tottenham
arts.sum: There are a couple of other Chelsea players who can play the left winger role aside from the aforementioned duo, such as Tyrique George and Pedro Neto. Enzo Maresca is happy with his two summer signings, Jamie Gittens and Alejandro Garnacho, whom he claimed are giving him exactly what he expects from his wingers.

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca delivers Tottenham & Thomas Frank verdict as Chelsea set piece plans revealed
arts.sum: Maresca is wary of Spurs and knows his Chelsea side will need to raise their game if they want to claim another three points and the London bragging rights for another year. Spurs' record against Chelsea is dismal - they have won just one of their last 13 Premier League games (D2, L10).

arts.ttl: How to Watch Tottenham vs. Chelsea on TV, Live Stream
arts.sum: Chelsea have dominated the head-to-head battle with their London rivals.

arts.ttl: Manager will be watching Tottenham vs Chelsea with interest – Could be crucial for World Cup
arts.sum: Brazil manager Carlo Ancelotti will be watching Tottenham vs Chelsea with interest. It could be crucial to who he picks as his starting striker at the World Cup next summer. That’s according to Correio Braziliense, who report that Tottenham vs Chelsea is ‘much more than just a Premier League match’. arts.sum: Chelsea midfielder Cole Palmer has been ruled out of the Premier League clash with Tottenham Hotspur on Saturday evening, but he has kept himself entertained ahead of the derby
